article_title: How Government Regulation Is Undermining Mental Health Care

article_metadata.description: Anyone who has given two seconds worth of thought to it knows that school shootings are not occurring because we have a gun problem. They are occurring because we have a mental health problem. So what are we doing about that? Not much. Despite several mental health parity laws, government [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
